body.name: MR.SIGA Pet Hair Removal Rubber Broom with Built in Squeegee, 3 in 1 Floor Brush for Carpet, 61 inch Adjustable Handle, Includes One Microfiber Cloth for Floor Dusting
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 31 mins
features: 3 in 1 RUBBER BROOM & SQUEEGEE - Made from natural rubber, a durable material which is not easy to get deformed, they are economical and practical, stain and odor resistant. Flexible rubber bristles collect dirt and hair with ease yet the built-in squeegee can be used safely on hardwood floors or windows without the risk of scratching. Works great on carpet, rug, tile, hardwood, marble, window.

VERSATILE & EASY TO MAINTAIN - It is tough enough to handle any scrubbing jobs, yet gentle enough to be used on shower glass doors and windows without damages. Rinse the brush head and clean with soap if needed and air dry after use. Keep it in cool place can extend their lifespan. Microfiber cloth captures dust and dirt easily, it's reusable and machine washable. Clip one side of the microfiber cloth on the black fixator and lay it under the rubber head for dusting.

PET HAIR REMOVER - Capture dog and cat hair on the carpet like a magnet, and clean the hair in the rugs which vacuums couldn't clean throughly. This multi-purpose rubber broom & squeegee is not only your household cleaning assistant, but also a great gift for your friend who owns adorable pets.

ADJUSTABLE EXTRA LONG 61" HANDLE - Comes with 4-section sturdy steel handle with a powder-coated finish, you can adjust the pole length and lock to any available position, which offers a comfortable pickup and hold for different person, makes your cleaning job without having to bend down.

MR.SIGA's mission: Make your housework easier, and make the world cleaner. If you’re not happy about the product, you’re covered by a full refund. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions you may have, we are here for support and advice!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MR.SIGA Pet Hair Removal Rubber Broom with Built in Squeegee

MULTI-PURPOSE CLEANING IDEAL FOR CARPET, RUG, TILE, HARDWOOD, MARBLE, WINDOW. Flexible rubber bristles easily collect hair from carpets and floors, and the built-in squeegee is safe to use on hardwood floors or windows, easily removing dirt water stains without the risk of scratching. An included microfibre rag can be used for floor dusting. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient cleaning tool!
reviews.reviewText: I have a Doberman mix who sheds moderately. I sweep every other day to keep things under control. I got this broom on a whim to see if I would help grab her hair more efficiently. It works really well! I can catch much more hair using this than a standard broom. The long handle allows me to get under surfaces like the couch and server.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use it as a shower cleaner for my polished porcelain walls. Works well, i.e. no scratches. Easy to put together and disassemble, if necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not great for short course carpet/rugs
reviews.reviewText: I tried to really dig deep with this and it just does not work well on a course carpet. I have a GSP so they hair is long and very straight but it just couldn’t pick everything up. The only thing I think I’d keep it for is the microfibre cloth that helps get under furniture on my hardwood floor. It definitely loosens the hair but doesn’t clump up like I wish it showed in the pictures. Definitely a workout but I don’t mind that. It does squeegee pretty good though too. It probably does good on longer carpet for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING- I will never buy a normal broom again! It sweeps, mops, & more.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was skeptical how well it would ‘sweep’ my German Shepards hair off a linoleum floor, as well as dust/ food debris. It picks up everything. A hole was recently drilled into the wall leaving drywall dust on the ground (fine & powdery) and it swept it all clean! I was so excited at the versatility & efficiency of this design I was sent into a cleaning frenzy! After I was done sweeping, I attached a rag around the ‘broom’ part and suddenly it was transformed into the best mop I could have asked for. It is collapsible and would fit in a shoulder bag/ backpack easily and is so great for travel. Especially if you like to clean up after yourself/ travel with pets. I even ‘swept’ a blanket my dog lays on every day- AND IT WORKED! I imagine it would be good for cleaning windows too, I intend to try that next...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Eh, it's ok
reviews.reviewText: ▪️Type of carpet used on: typical, average pile carpet▪️Heres what I like first: The handle is easy to assemble and is "short people" friendly, I am average height but I have family who isn't but the handle is in segments and leaving one out doesn't affect the usability. I also like that it fluffs up the carpet and pulls up some of that stuff that gets settled in the carpet fibers which helps the vacuum gets more stuff and makes the carpet appear vacuumed (in case you have company call and say they are just up the road and you have no time to vacuum). It's also lightweight and easy to clean. It's also easy to store.▪️Now on to my other thoughts on this item: We have two cats plus my hubby and I both have long hair. We all shed, so I thought I'd try to help the vacuum out (I have an pet hair vac that works great but want to prolong its life) by removing some of the surface hair and pulling up some of the buried litter and dirt. I am not sure this thing works as well unless you have low pile carpet AND pets who shed a lot like long haired floofy cats or pomeranians or similar that have softer, less corse hair. I don't think it works as well with hair/fur that is more corse. It works great for pulling litter out of the carpet fibers and other dirt that is down in there, and it works great to fluff the carpet fibers to make it look "new". It does remove hair, so to say it doesn't work at all is not accurate. But it depends on the type of coat your pets have and how much they shed.▪️As for the sturdiness of it? It's ok, as long as you are just using a gentle pulling motion, but if you use it like you are raking gravel, it's not going to work right and the handle is likely to bend if not break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Worth It
reviews.reviewText: I found a whole other cat buried in my carpet. Nox was shocked. Took 5 minutes and my rug is cleaner than what a $50 vacuum did. Excellent product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The picture speaks for its self
reviews.reviewText: This thing is pretty sick, I didn’t realize how much cat hair there was in the carpet. This is the second time I’ve done this in my room, and now my carpet is spotless. My vacuum never came close to making my floors look this nice!It is totally an arm workout though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow wow wow
reviews.reviewText: We love this thing. We have two big dogs that shed alot. The regular broom never gets all the hair. This thing gets everything. Makes a nice big pile of hair and whatever else is on your floor. Our house is all tile so we love it!! Highly recommend!🤪

reviews.reviewTitle: Fabulous for getting pet hair off of carpets
reviews.reviewText: This is a great tool. I’ve used it to scrub the kitchen floor before mopping and it’s twice as clean. Easy to clean off. Also used it to clean my car. The long pole is perfect. Maybe buying a second one to keep in my car permanently.

Es excelente para recoger el pelo que tiran las mascotas, mi perro tira mucho pelo y con una escoba normal es molesto barrer porqie luego el pelo se enreda en las cerdas de la escoba pero con esta escoba es todo lo contrario, todo el pelo lo arastra y lo junto sin problemas. Eso si, no es para barrer polvo, primero uso esta escoba y de ahi una normal para barrer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This kind of broom is perfect if you have pet and the option for easy mopping is very nice
Pulisce benissimo tutte le superfici, ancora di più pavimenti dei balconi, terrazzo e garage
